data.name: Mortal Vessel
data.detailed_description:
Elynovia, a cursed land that was abandoned by god, once a peaceful place to live, now is nothing but eternal chaos and darkness. A place of the undead, demons, and unknown creatures roaming around aimlessly. The curse has not lifted yet, until one day a god from another realm decides to interfere by reincarnation his greatest hero into this world. With the blessing of god, the hero's soul is able to choose and possess a new body or vessel from this world.


  • Fully animated battles
-Both Enemies and Player have animated image
-Stunning and beautiful skill effect

  • Unique Monsters, Skills, and Items
-Over 50+ Monsters type
-Over 80+ unique skills
-Over 80+ unique items
-All playable creatures have a unique skill tree

  • Element Affinity System
Each monster and player have different elements of weakness and strength

  • Procedurally Generated
Random events, monsters, treasure, and traps on certain dungeon

  • Relaxing battle systems
-No Random Encounter Enemies
-Classic Turn-Based RPG Game

data.short_description: A dungeon crawler turn-based RPG where you play a hero that has the ability to possess creatures. Featured more than 10 creatures, each of them have a unique skill and ability, Including upgradable skills, ultimate skills, and combine with other skills.
